main.name: Alvaro Reyes
main.description: I'm a android developer native & working everyday for become front end developer...
main.bio: Hi there! I am Alvaro! , I've been coding for over 2 years now. As a mobile developer I've worked both with startup corporations to help build & scale their companie. Currently in my work I work as an android developer, creating new mobile solutions for national companies of different directions.Despite the short time I have been in this world of programming, I think I have found a profession in which I am motivated every day to study and practice to try to improve more and more and thus contribute in a better way to my work.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to collaborate with you!

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Junior software developer , i have created  movile applications in android. Also, i give support to plataform AMS website , all this with ObjectScript language in backend.
